product information:
The 15-inch gray Elo Touch IntelliTouch 1515L offers a native resolution of 1024 x 768 at 75 Hz with 16.7 million colors. This Elo Touch touchmonitor offers a contrast ratio of 500:1 and an aspect ratio of 4:3. The IntelliTouch Surface Wave Technology-powered glass surface on this Elo Touch LCD monitor is resilient against spilled food, grease, and liquids. Choose from among Acoustic Pulse Recognition Technology, IntelliTouch Surface Wave Technology, and AccuTouch Five-Wire Resistive Technology on your Elo Touch IntelliTouch 1515L. This Elo Touch LCD monitor delivers cost-effective touch tools for sectors like retail and hospitality. You can opt for 3-track magnetic stripe reader (credit card reader), which can be easily installed on this Elo Touch touchmonitor, to deliver a reliable, efficient and smart computing system. The wall-mountable Elo Touch IntelliTouch 1515L is network-compatible and is provided with RS-232 and USB interfaces, for easy connectivity to any POS.
